          <title>
            <string language="en">Danger of extinction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gefahr der Löschung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Danger de l'extinction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Perigo da extinção</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Pericolo di estinzione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κίνδυνος της εξάλειψης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Peligro de la extinción</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This chart shows the percentage of mammals, birds, and fishes facing extinction.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">extinction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">fish</string>

          <keyword>

          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt den Prozentsatz der 
Säugetiere, Vögel und fischt Einfassunglöschung.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme montre le pourcentage des 
mammifères, oiseaux, et pêche l'extinction de revêtements.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta carta mostra a porcentagem dos mamíferos, 
pássaros, e pesca a extinção dos revestimentos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa tabella mostra la percentuale dei 
mammiferi, uccelli e pesca l'estinzione dei rivestimenti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα εμφανίζει το ποσοστό των 
θηλαστικών, των πουλιών, και των ψαριών που αντιμετωπίζει την 
εξάλειψη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta carta muestra el porcentaje de los 
mamíferos, pájaros, y pesca la extinción de los revestimientos.</string>
          </description>
